Jimsey in Kalaragi? A Lord above the waterfall?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Storyline Topics: Jimsey in Kalaragi? A Lord above the waterfall?
By torey luvullo on Saturday, October 27, 2001 - 06:06 am:

i was raising my colorpandoras in kalagari last night, and, out of the blue, Jimsey appeared. I dont recall him appearing in kalaragi before, so i perked up, and this is what he said:

"I hear above Ubagi Waterfall there is a Lord named Raoo. First raised by humans, the monster continues to live at the waterfall and protects Kalaragi to this day."

is he just talking about the ape? doesnt really live above the waterfall, but otherwise he fits the description. or is there another bit of business in kalaragi that i have not yet experienced?

By John Hawley on Saturday, October 27, 2001 - 07:43 am:

That's a new one on me. I've had a message about a monster living above the waterfall, but not a Lord. I always assumed it was the flower-lizard since he lives near the top of the waterfall.

By Djinnmastr on Saturday, October 27, 2001 - 10:26 am:

Was this a typical rival meeting, or did jimsey come just to say that, like in a storyline? (I.E., no choice of talk, trade, battle, split)
Also, you have seen jimsey there before, hes a main part of the storyline in kalaragi

By torey_luvullo on Saturday, October 27, 2001 - 10:41 am:

i was only half paying attention, djinn, but iirc, i did not have to choose "talk" to talk to him; he just barged in and said that to me.

i haven't been keeping track, so you are probably right about me seeing jimsey there before, but if i did, it hasnt been recently.

By Nate Railsback on Saturday, October 27, 2001 - 08:36 pm:

Yeah, Jimsey's part of the initial storyline in Kalaragi that's bogged down so many people in the "bug" there. He's the one that steals your money, and who you have to save from Gadamon.

By torey_luvullo on Sunday, October 28, 2001 - 06:19 am:

thanx nate.

By ember on Friday, December 7, 2001 - 03:42 am:
